column4: you have to use a remote computer as a proxy server to increase privacy, correct?  i.e., a proxy server on a local network is still just the same local network to the internet?
does a proxy server also increase security in any way?
some companies implement proxy to be the only way to access the internet, i.e. the client cannot access internet thru other means.
I'm using AT&T...  I changed their modem to pass PPoE to my router
